patterns: Do you know any interesting facts?
responses: Did you know? Honey never spoils! Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible.
Octopuses have three hearts! Two pump blood to the gills, while one pumps it to the rest of the body.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't!
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all the Earth's beaches.
Sharks existed before trees!
You are amazing just the way you are!
The world is better because you're in it!
You're more awesome than you realize!
Your positivity is contagious!
You're a star, keep shining!

patterns: Can you recommend something to eat?

A good pizza never disappoints!
